Articles.Content:
So I have been introduced to Krag's Planet factory and RSS. Is there a way to bring these 2 great mods together and make our RSS an accessible system near Kerbol?

I don't know how to edit planets, I would learn if I had the time. But I think this would be really cool. We could then visit ourselves with little Green men (and eventually women).

Edited February 3, 2015 by Hydrokracker
add title and moar info
